ResearchProjectDef.label: gunpowder
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft early muzzle loading weapons and black powder ammunition.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->produced crude firearms and rough powder
subject_story->led sieges using large blackpowder cannons
subject_story->was revered by a tribe for the act of creating thunder

ResearchProjectDef.label: simple launchers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the production of basic grenade and rocket launchers.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->taught outlanders to take down centipedes
subject_story->learned how to efficiently pack FSX
subject_story->destroyed a pirate outpost's fortifications using grenade launchers

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced launchers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the production of more advanced launchers and munitions like the incendiary, triple rocket, or doomsday launcher and time-fuzed explosives.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->caused the largest recorded explosion with a custom rocket

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced ammunition
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the production of advanced ammunition for small arms and light weapons systems like armor-piercing incendiary, sabot, and high-explosive rounds.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->discovered how to pack FSX into intermediate calibers
subject_story->learned to use a discarding sabot to defeat powered armor
subject_story->supplied a planetary army with effective unconventional munitions

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic optoelectronics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the production of simple electro-optical devices, like night vision goggles.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->worked on developing delicate light sensors
subject_story->experimented with using vacuum tubes to amplify captured light
subject_story->instructed early midworld soldiers in night combat

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced optoelectronics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the production of more advanced and specialized electro-optical devices, including better night vision goggles.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->tried integrating digital image enhancement into existing models
subject_story->led the research on combining several captured images into a wide-area view
